sources.title: Much Ado About Nothing (1940)
sources.description: Little Cute Chickie Duck loves little lucky Dinky Duck but they have a quarrel, which leads their parents to have a quarrel, which leads to a big-duck brawl...careful, there...which leads to much ado about nothing as Chickie and Dinky have made up and gone floating together. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/much-ado-about-nothing-1940/

metadata.Plot: Little Cute Chickie Duck loves little lucky Dinky Duck but they have a quarrel, which leads their parents to have a quarrel, which leads to a big-duck brawl...careful, there...which leads to much ado about nothing as Chickie and Dinky have made up and gone floating together.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
